author: Wilsker
body:
Functionality added to SiStripMonitorClusters and SiStripMonitorDigis packages to enable monitoring of the number of Clusters or number of digis per FED Id.

SiStripMonitorClusters package edits:

Monitoring element instantiated in SiStripMonitorClusters.h
Histogram PSet created in SiStripMonitorClusters_cfi.py
NumberOfFEDClus Histogram added to SiStripMonitorClusters.cc in "createMEs" method.
Map of FED Id and associated cumulative sum of clusters from all detectors and layers created.
Loop over detector Ids, get Fed Id and add number of clusters to cumulative sum.
Edit map values for given fedid.
Use map to fill histogram.
All the above in "analyze" method of SiStripMonitorClusters.cc.

SiStripMonitorDigi package edits:

Monitoring element instantiated in SiStripMonitorDigis.h
Histogram PSet created in SiStripMonitorDigis_cfi.py
NumberOfFEDigis Histogram added to SiStripMonitorDigis.cc in "createMEs" method.
Map of FED Id and associated cumulative sum of digis from all detectors and layers created.
Loop over detector Ids, get Fed Id and add number of digis to cumulative sum.
Edit map values for given fedid.
Use map to fill histogram.
All the above in "analyze" method of SiStripMonitorDigis.cc.
title: Adding Per FED Id monitoring for clusters and digis.
